item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
• [strider_baseurl_link href="/balance-bikes" label='See the Bikes ']
  • [strider_baseurl_link href="/learn-to-ride" label='Learn to Ride ']

Inspire your child to ride with a Strider Balance Bike

 
[striderslider ids="134,135,136,137,138" instance="progression" showtitle="false" link="none" hasclass="false" slslidestoshow="1" slslidestoscroll="1" slarrows="false" slfade="false" sldots="false" slcentermode="false" slfocusonselect="true" slautoplay="true" slautoplayspeed="3500"]

Evolution of a Strider Rider!

Support the child - NOT the bike! The child must feel the bike tip sideways to learn how to keep it upright. Let the child set the pace: some kids are cautious and that's ok! Be a cheerleader, not a coach: praise your child for any amount of time they spend on the Strider!
[striderslider ids="134,135,136,137,138" instance="progression-nav" showtitle="true" link="none" hasclass="false" slslidestoshow="5" slslidestoscroll="1" slarrows="false" slfade="false" slasnavfor="progression" sldots="false" slcentermode="false" slfocusonselect="false" slautoplay="false"]
 
 

Strider Balance Bikes

5 out of 5 stars.

Are Consistently Rated 5 Stars!

What is a Balance Bike?

Balance bikes are a very simple bike designed to teach young children how to steer and balance on two wheels. Balance bikes are designed with only foot propulsion to teach the fundamentals of riding. Because they have no pedals or other complicated forms of propulsion, most children find riding a balance bike as easy as walking. When the fundamentals of balance and steering are mastered, transitioning to a bicycle with pedals or motorcycle is straightforward.

  [strider_baseurl_link href="/balance-bikes" label="SEE THE BIKES" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block"]

item.title: Learn to Ride
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
Learn to Ride!

A Strider No-Pedal Balance Bike is the perfect tool for learning to ride, teaching balance, and instilling riding skills in toddlers, children, and adults of all abilities.

Rethink the Definition of Riding

What defines riding? Does pedaling define riding? Downhill mountain bikers don't pedal, road bike riders descending a highway don't pedal, BMX riders in a halfpipe don't pedal, and motorcyclists don't pedal. They are all riding. So what do they all have in common? The ability to balance on two wheels and lean through turnsregardless of what put them in motion. For children, walking and running are the natural means of propulsion. The simplicity of Strider Bikes allows children to concentrate on the fundamental skills of balancing, leaning, and steering while propelling the bike in a natural way.

Advantages of Riding a Strider

Research shows that learning balance and coordination with exercise jump-starts a childs growth and development during the important formative years of early childhood. Strider Bikes:
  • Are ultra-lightweight and easy to control
  • Increase balance, coordination, and confidence
  • Allow children to focus on learning balance first
  • Are free of chains, pedals, and protrusions that can harm a child
  • Provide a safe, smooth, and natural transition to a pedal bike
[striderslider ids="173,174,175,176" showtitle="false" link="file" slvertical="true" slverticalswiping="true" slslidestoshow="2" slslidestoscroll="1" slarrows="false" slfade="false" sldots="false" slcentermode="false" slfocusonselect="true" slautoplay="true" slautoplayspeed="2500" slinfinite="true"]
  [strider_baseurl_link href="/balance-bikes" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg h1" label="See the Bikes"]

item.title: Balance Bikes
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-red-side.jpg" style="max-width: 80%;"]

Genuine

Strider Balance Bike

has taught over 1.5 million toddlers to ride!

[strider_baseurl_link href="/balance-bikes/12-sport" class="btn btn-lg btn-default btn-block" label="SHOP NOW"]
 
 
What is a balance bike? Balance bikes are a very simple bike designed to teach young children how to steer and balance on two wheels. Balance bikes are designed with only foot propulsion to teach the fundamentals of riding. When the fundamentals of balance and steering are mastered, transitioning to a bicycle with pedals or motorcycle is easy.
When learning to ride, a child needs to experience the feel of leaning and how steering affects the balance of the bike. Without leaning, such as on a tricycle or bike with training wheels, they aren't really learning to ride at all! By starting out on a balance bike, your child will develop balance, coordination, and confidence!
[strider_comparison_chart]
Genuine Strider Balance Bikes are the result of more than 10 years of development, manufacturing improvements, riding, observation, testing, and even racing. The patented design of the Strider is lightweight and allows for a very low minimum seat height. The Strider Balance Bike was designed for 18 month old children to learn to ride. Strider Balance Bikes are clearly the best choice for inspiring your child to ride.

item.title: 12 Sport
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
[gallery link="file" columns="1" ids="312,306,310,314" orderby="rand"]
  [strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-green-1.jpg" alt="Green Strider 12 Sport Balance Bike"]

Strider 12 Sport

Most popular Strider model

The Strider 12 Sport is the most popular Strider model. Durability and a wide range of features make the Sport perfect for itty-bitty riders starting out at 18 months to growing 4-5 year olds perfecting their balance and riding skills! With a decade of design evolution and manufacturing improvements, the 12 Sport is the best performance and value.

  Price:$119.99  
Purchase
 

Available in 7 colors!

[gallery columns="7" link="file" size="full" ids="356,357,358,359,360,361,362" orderby="rand"]
 

A step up from the entry level Classic model, the Sport includes additional features for both parents and children! The patented steel frame and puncture-proof tires require no maintenance. Seat and handlebar height are quickly adjustable without the use of tools. The popular Sport model has improved ergonomics, with built-in footrests and a padded seat sized perfectly for toddler hips. Mini-grips tailored for small hands improve control and a cushy handlebar pad looks great while improving safety. Available in an assortment of vibrant colors, the Strider 12 Sport quality and range will make your childs Strider Balance Bike experience one-of-a-kind from beginning to end!

Strider Bikes are designed with a low seat height so children can start riding when they are 18 months old. The Sport features an extra-long seat adjustment range, adjusting from 28 - 48 cm (11 - 19 in), to fit children with an inseam 30 - 51 cm (12 - 20 in). This means it will grow with your child even longer, up to 5 years old!

Strider Bikes have taught millions of children how to balance and ride on two wheelswithout the distractions and complications of pedals or training wheels. With over 1.5 million sold, parents agree Strider is the top of the line balance bike brand!

 
 

The Strider Balance Bike Difference Designed to ensure riding success

 
[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-green-handlebars.jpg" alt="Handlebars of Green Strider 12 Sport Balance Bike"]
Handlebar

12.7mm handlebar and mini-grips are 43% smaller than standard to allow better control with tiny hands. The protective ends of the soft polyvinyl grips prevent the handlebar from poking through.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-tension-bushings.jpg" alt="Headset Tension Bushing for Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Bushings

3rd generation headset bushing is specifically engineered to be lightweight and durable.This self-tensioning, self-lubricating polymer headset bushing will give years of smooth steering.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-green-seat.jpg" alt="Seat of Green Strider 12 Sport Balance Bike"]
Seat

Designed for a toddler, the padded seat allows for proper riding position and posture. The Sport model features a long seat adjustment range for growing children.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-wheel.jpg" alt="Wheel of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Ultralight Wheels

5-spokes with support gussets for strength and precision cartridge bearings that roll smoothly provide a lightweight, stable wheel that requires no maintenance.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-green-wheel-tire.jpg" alt="Wheels and Tires of Strider 12 Sport Balance Bike"]
EVA Polymer Tires

Super light puncture-proof tires provide a smooth ride while never needing air or going flat. The EVA Polymer material is designed for the weight and traction needs of a toddler.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-green-brake-mount.jpg" alt="Brake Mount of Green Strider 12 Sport Balance Bike"]
Brake Mount

Strider-exclusive rear brake mount allows the addition of a foot-operated brake once riders are proficiently gliding with feet on the footrests. Brake sold separately.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-green-seat-clamp.jpg" alt="Seat Clamp of Green Strider 12 Sport Balance Bike"]
Quick Clamps

Machined aluminum quick release clamps allows saddle height and handlebar adjustment for the perfect fit without ever needing tools.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-sport-green-footrest.jpg" alt="Footrests of Green Strider 12 Sport Balance Bike"]
Footrest

Frame-integrated footrests are properly positioned directly below the saddle for natural bike balance and advanced riding skills.

   
   

Strider Sport Features

  • Assembled Weight: 3.0 kg (6.7 lbs)
  • Easy Tool-Free Assembly
  • Fully Adjustable with Easy-Adjust Clamps
  • Handlebar Height: 46 - 56 cm (18 - 22 in)
  • Seat Height: 28 - 48 cm (11 - 19 in)
  • Padded Seat and 2 Seatposts
  • Ultralight Molded Wheels with Maintenance-Free Sealed Cartridge Bearings
  • Flat-Free EVA Polymer 12 Tires
  • U.S. Patented Steel Frame with Built-In Footrests
  • Mini-Grip Handlebar with Safety Pad
  • Max. Rider Weight: 27 kg (60 lbs)
  • Ages 18 Months to 5 Years
  • Safety Tested to CPSC and CE Standards
[strider_comparison_chart]

item.title: 12 Classic
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
[gallery link="file" columns="1" ids="466,467,468" orderby="rand"]
  [strider_baseurl_img src="strider-classic-red-side.jpg" alt="Red Strider 12 Classic Balance Bike"]

Strider 12 Classic

Entry-level Strider model

The Strider 12 Classic is our traditional entry-level balance bike. This simple and durable model is lightweight making learning to ride easy for first time balance bike riders. The Strider Classic utilizes the basic characteristics as the top-selling Strider 12 Sport at an affordable price for the budget-minded family.

  Price: $99.99  
Purchase
 
 

Available in 4 colors!

[gallery columns="4" link="file" size="full" ids="357,358,361,362" orderby="rand"]
 

The 12 Classic is great for skill-building with features including adjustable seat and handle bar height, built-in footrests, and a plastic all-weather seat. Available in a selection of vibrant colors, the Classic is a great entry into the genuine Strider brand. Watch in amazement as your child transitions to a pedal bike without ever needing a tricycle or training wheels!

Strider Bikes are designed with a low seat height so children can start riding when they are 18 months old. The Classic, with aseat adjustment range from 28 - 41 cm (11 - 16 in), is designed to fit children with an inseam 30 - 43 cm (12 - 17 in), or up to 3 years old. If you are looking for a full-featured bike that can grow with your rider even longer, check out the Strider 12 Sport.

Strider Bikes have taught millions of children how to balance and ride on two wheelswithout the distractions and complications of pedals or training wheels. With over 1 million sold, parents agree Strider is the top of the line balance bike brand!

 
 

The Strider Balance Bike Difference Designed to ensure riding success

 
[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-tension-bushings.jpg" alt="Headset Tension Bushing for Strider 12 Classic Balance Bike"]
Bushings

3rd generation headset bushing is specifically engineered to be lightweight and durable. This self-tensioning, self-lubricating polymer headset bushing will give years of smooth steering.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-classic-wheel.jpg" alt="Wheel of Strider 12 Classic Balance Bike"]
Ultralight Wheels

5-spokes with support gussets for strength and precision cartridge bearings that roll smoothly provide a lightweight, stable wheel that requires no maintenance.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-classic-red-wheel-tire.jpg" alt="Tires of Strider 12 Classic Balance Bike"]
EVA Polymer Tires

Super light puncture-proof tires provide a smooth ride while never needing air or going flat. The EVA Polymer material is designed for the weight and traction needs of a toddler.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-classic-red-brake-mount.jpg" alt="Brake Mount of Green Strider 12 Classic Balance Bike"]
Brake Mount

Strider-exclusive rear brake mount allows the addition of a foot-operated brake once the kids are proficiently gliding with feet on the footrests. Brake sold separately.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-classic-red-footrest.jpg" alt="Footrests of Green Strider 12 Classic Balance Bike"]
Footrest

Frame-integrated footrests are properly positioned directly below the saddle for natural bike balance and advanced riding skills.

   
   

Strider Classic Features

  • Learn to ride and balance on two wheels without training wheels or pedals
  • Patented design is simple and durable for years of use
  • Maintenance free puncture proof tires
  • Lightweight with lowest seat height for the youngest possible starting age
  • Unique, built-in footrests for smooth, easy gliding and trick riding
  • Durable, all-weather plastic mini seat wont rip or tear
  • Easily adjustable seat and handlebar heighttool included
[strider_comparison_chart]

item.title: 12 Pro
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-side.jpg" alt="Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]

Strider 12 Pro

The premium Strider Balance Bike

The Strider 12 Pro is the premium Strider Balance Bike model. This high-end model has an all-aluminum frame making it the lightest Strider available. The Pro will let your child ride longer and farther without becoming fatigued.

  Price: $169.99  
Purchase
 

The Pro includes all the best-selling features of the Strider 12 Sport with the addition of a race-ready number plate, performance footrest, and lightweight aluminum frame. Puncture-proof tires require no maintenance. Seat and handlebar height are quickly adjustable without the use of tools. The footrest and padded seat are sized perfectly for toddler hips. Mini-grips tailored for small hands improve control and a handlebar pad improves safety. The only Strider available in silver, the lightweight and feature-packed Strider 12 Pro is the top-of-the-line choice for your childs first bike!

Strider Bikes are designed with a low seat height so children can start riding when they are 18 months old. The Pro also features an extra-long seat adjustment range, adjusting from 28 - 48 cm (11 - 19 in), to fit children with an inseam 30 - 51 cm (12 - 20 in). This means it will grow with your child even longer, up to 5 years old!

Strider Bikes have taught millions of children how to balance and ride on two wheelswithout the distractions and complications of pedals or training wheels. With over 1.5 million sold, parents agree Strider is the top of the line balance bike brand!

 
 

The Strider Balance Bike Difference Designed to ensure riding success

 
[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-handlebars.jpg" alt="Handlebars of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Handlebar

12.7mm handlebar and mini-grips are 43% smaller than standard to allow better control with tiny hands. The protective ends of the soft polyvinyl grips prevent the handlebar from poking through.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-tension-bushings.jpg" alt="Headset Tension Bushing for Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Bushings

3rd generation headset bushing is specifically engineered to be lightweight and durable. This self-tensioning, self-lubricating polymer headset bushing will give years of smooth steering.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-seat.jpg" alt="Seat of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Seat

Designed for a toddler, the padded seat allows for proper riding position and posture. The Pro model features a long seat adjustment range for growing children.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-wheel.jpg" alt="Wheel of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Ultralight Wheels

5-spokes with support gussets for strength and precision cartridge bearings that roll smoothly provide a lightweight, stable wheel that requires no maintenance.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-wheel-tire.jpg" alt="Wheel and Tire of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
EVA Polymer Tires

Super light puncture-proof tires provide a smooth ride while never needing air or going flat. The EVA Polymer material is designed for the weight and traction needs of a toddler.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-brake-mount.jpg" alt="Brake Mount of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Brake Mount

Strider-exclusive rear brake mount allows the addition of a foot-operated brake once riders are proficiently gliding with feet on the footrests. Brake sold separately.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-seat-clamp.jpg" alt="Seat Clamp of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Quick Clamps

Machined aluminum quick release clamps allows saddle height and handlebar adjustment for the perfect fit without ever needing tools.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-number-plate.jpg" alt="Number Plate of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Number Plate

Race-ready number plate with custom graphics makes the lightweight Pro ready for your toddler to race at an Adventure Zone or Strider Cup event.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-performance-footrest.jpg" alt="Performance Footrest of Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Footrest

The Performance Footrest makes the Pro the best handling bike in the Strider lineup. A neutral position directly below the saddle fosters advanced riding skills.

[strider_baseurl_img src="strider-pro-super-lightweight.jpg" alt="Super Lightweight Strider 12 Pro Balance Bike"]
Aluminum Frame!

The Strider Pro is super lightweight at only 2.5 kg (5.6 lbs). This high-end balance bike will make any child feel and ride like a superhero!

   
   

Strider Pro Specifications

  • World's Lightest Strider: 2.5 kg (5.6 lbs)
  • No-Tool Assembly
  • Fully Adjustable with Easy-Adjust Clamps
  • Handlebar Height: 46 - 56 cm (18 - 22 in)
  • Seat Height: 28 - 48 cm (11 - 19 in)
  • Padded Seat and 2 Seatposts
  • Ultralight Molded Wheels with Maintenance-Free Sealed Cartridge Bearings
  • Flat-Free EVA Polymer 12 Tires
  • Lightweight, U.S. Patented Aluminum Frame
  • Exclusive Performance Footrest
  • Mini-Grip Handlebar with Safety Pad
  • Racing Number Plate with Pro Graphics
  • Available in Silver
  • Max. Rider Weight: 27 kg (60 lbs)
  • Ages 18 Months to 5 Years
  • Safety Tested to CPSC and CE Standards
[strider_comparison_chart]

item.title: Events
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
Strider Bikes are taking the world by storm!

Everyone wants in on the action, whether it's a Strider Adventure Zone at a small local event, a Strider Cup race in a city near you, or the big Strider Cup World Championship event, one - or ALL - of these could be right for you. Strider Balance Bike Bike races will entertain your toddler and give them the opportunity to be part of a growing community of riding enthusiasts! They will be making new friends and clicking their sippy-cups together as a cheers to a great day of friendly competition!
 

Events:

To Be Announced
 

See the World-wide Strider Event Calendar

item.title: Brand Story
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
[striderslider ids="635,634,633,632,631,630,629" instance="story" showtitle="false" link="file" slvertical="true" slverticalswiping="true" slslidestoshow="3" slslidestoscroll="1" slarrows="false" slfade="false" sldots="false" slcentermode="false" slfocusonselect="true" slautoplay="true" slautoplayspeed="2500" slinfinite="true" sladaptiveheight="true"]

The Strider Brand Story

Strider Sports International Inc. was founded in 2007, beginning a revolution in how very young children learn to ride on two wheels. The revolution that first started in the United States quickly spread around the world, with Strider Balance Bikes being sold in Japan in 2009 and Europe in 2010. Strider believes in not only their exceptional products, but also that a bike is more than just a "thing" - its a community! In 2011 Strider hosted the first Strider World Championship race, bringing together children from 2 to 5 years old from all over the world in friendly competition. The fun didnt stop there. Currently Strider Cup races are run all over the globe with riders who are just starting out to seasoned Strider riders who give it their all on the race course. In 2012 the Strider Bike became a tool for year-round fun, even when there is snow on the ground, with the launch of the Strider Ski Accessory. 2013 and 2014 became all about celebrating success and giving back. Strider Education and the Strider Rider Fund were established. These programs provide freedom on two wheels to individuals who might not otherwise have that chance. Parents from all over the world have made it clear how much they love Strider and the Strider philosophy, and in 2015 the 1 millionth Strider Balance Bike was sold! Parents have continued to show their support for Strider by making it the #1 selling balance bike brand. In 2016, even younger children were able to begin their riding journey with the Strider Rocking Base. By equipping a Strider Balance Bike with a Rocking Base, children as young as 12 months old can begin using their Strider to learn balance and coordination! Through innovation, education, support and engagement, Strider has built the best balance bike on the market today. The Strider Bike develops two-wheeled balance, coordination, and confidence in children better than anything else available. #StrideOn!

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: strideradmin
item.content:encoded:
We believe a Strider Balance Bike is the best way for your child to develop coordination and confidence both on two wheels and in life. We are so confident you and your child will love their Strider Bike we provide a 60-day guarantee. Please contact us if you need anything, or to share the story of your child's success! As an authorized distributor of Genuine Strider Balance Bikes, we are proud to be leading the way by providing the best products for children to learn to ride! Purchasing through one of our dealers is the only way to ensure your child is riding a Genuine Strider!  

We welcome your questions and feedback.

  Company Name Address Phone Hours
